title: Judge hands Redstone family victory in CBS dispute
text:
Judge hands Redstone family victory in CBS dispute Thursday, May 17, 2018 - 01:38
A judge declined on Thursday to issue a restraining order against Shari Redstone, allowing her to exert control over CBS Corp (CBS.N) and dealing a setback to the U.S. media company’s plans to strip her voting power and thwart a merger with Viacom.
A judge declined on Thursday to issue a restraining order against Shari Redstone, allowing her to exert control over CBS Corp (CBS.N) and dealing a setback to the U.S. media company’s plans to strip her voting power and thwart a merger with Viacom. //reut.rs/2KwN6VS
